title: Divider: color
code:
<gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s" padding="xl">
  <gds-card width="100%" variant="secondary">
    <gds-divider color="primary"></gds-divider>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card width="100%" variant="secondary">
    <gds-divider color="secondary"></gds-divider>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card width="100%" variant="secondary">
    <gds-divider color="tertiary"></gds-divider>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card width="100%" variant="secondary">
    <gds-divider color="negative"></gds-divider>
  </gds-card>
</gds-flex>
